entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • We are hitting some random failures on some of template tests #25458
    Backlog
  • Blazor tests with tricky names failing on GA Release #25457
  • blank page on signin apple ios18 #25456
  • Documentation: Contradictory workload versions #25454
  • Cannot deploy a maui applikation on IOs! #25451
  • Ios crash when returning from background #25449
  • Connectivity NETWORK_CAPABILITIES_CHANGED causing SIGSEGV Segfault? #25446
  • OrientationSensor.Default.ReadingChanged not firing on ipadOS #25445
  • Resuming app from background service results in System.InvalidOperationException MauiContext is null. #25443
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • BoxView with no dimension given in a grid is not displayed (unexpected behavior when migrating from Xamarin) #25442
  • Can`t pack maui at local using public resource #25441
  • Referenced assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.WindowsForms does not have a strong name #25439
  • PlatformBehavior is not attached to to the view if the view is in a header or a footer #25438
    Backlog
  • [.NET 9] Shell Flyout menu not rendering after navigating from a MenuItem page #25436
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Shell Flyout header spacing and dynamic height issue on iOS #25435
  • Collection view with horizontal grid layout has extra space on right (end) of collection #25433
    Backlog

Closed

  • CollectionView ItemSizingStrategy:"MeasureFirstItem" renders labels incorrectly (.net8, .net9) #25191
    Backlog
  • Processing Resources failed with error: Duplicate Entry #25434
  • [Enhancement] (HybridWebView) - Invoke C# code from JavaScript #6446
    Backlog
  • HybridWebView: Add support for JavaScript to invoke C# methods #22304
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS #12429
    Backlog
  • Codesign fails with replacing existing signature and errSecInternalComponent #25432
  • Blazor Hybrid templates have an empty title bar #25337
  • ScrollView behaviour with Entry and visible Keyboard (iOS) #25455
  • Consider making BlazorWebView Android 'fire and forget' disposal on by default #24250
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • RC2: Triggers and MultiBindings do not inherit their parent datatype #25141
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [net9.0] Blazor MAUI App hangs during back navigation because of disconnect code #24407
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Documentation: macOS install link redirects #25452
  • Assets file ‘C:\*\obj\project.assets.json' doesn't have a target for 'net9.0-ios'. Ensure that restore has run and that you have included 'net9.0-ios' in the TargetFrameworks for your project. #25431
  • Animations are not working in Xiaomi HyperOS (and Oppo ColorOS) #25428
  • [Loc] The string “Framework” is not localized when creating new maui application #25215

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx] [testing] These Semantic tests seem to fail often on MacCatalyst #25459
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • 25421- ListViewRenderer Crash in HostApp and BindingError was occured in windows platforms #25453
    community ✨
  • Fixed crash when calling ItemsView.ScrollTo on unloaded CollectionView #25444
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Add missing android font weight #25437
    platform/android 🤖, area-fonts, community ✨

Merged

  • [Android] Fixed CollectionView MeasureFirstItem Rendering issue #25367
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Updates for ASPNET GA branding #25348
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Moving last Xamarin.UITests to Appium #25366
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • HybridWebView: Invoke .NET methods from JavaScript #25077
    area-controls-hybridwebview, .NET 9.0 GA
  • [ios,tests] Fix iOS Header with Group #25157
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview
  • Merge NET9 GA into main #25422
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Blazor Hybrid] Fire and forget `BlazorWebView` disposal by default #25430

Updated

  • [ci] Build public #24388
    area-infrastructure
  • [testing] These Semantic tests seem to fail often on MacCatalyst #25408
    area-testing, testing-flakiness, testing-green-ci, .NET 9 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix for Single item alignment issue in CollectionView HorizontalGrid Layout #25370
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed [Windows] TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #25311
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-gestures
  • [Android] ClearButtonVisibility with margin fix #25392
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Creating .NET MAUI Project sometimes causes error *.png is being used by another process #25374
  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
  • [Testing] Implement Pinch gestures in UITest extensions methods #25316
    area-testing
  • [Testing] More ignore attributes for UITests #25345
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Testing] Refactor ported Xamarin.UITest tests #25350
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Add New .NET MAUI Template with Syncfusion Toolkit Integration #25419
    area-templates, community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Debug slow controls device tests #25096
    do-not-merge
  • Make Style nullable #25230
    community ✨
  • Fix memory leak on repeated Animations #25232
    area-animation, community ✨, memory-leak 💦
  • Fixed Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #25003
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #2 #25378
    area-testing
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fix for Frame PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #25239
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • Fix for picker on hidden page opens after back navigation in Android #25319
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for TextDecorations not updating after modifying Label text #25339
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [iOS] Transparent button border color when border color is not set #25373
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #1 #25178
    area-testing
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fixed TextCell Command executes only once #25066
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [Testing] Implement ContextMenu UITest extension methods #25340
    area-testing
  • Fix for issue 24557 Android OnKeyUp not capturing keypresses #25429
    platform/android 🤖
